class Person {
	var id = 0
	var name = "ì´ë¦„"
	var email = "abc@gmail.com"
}

class Student: Person {
	var grade = 1
}

class Undergraduate: Student {
	var major = "Alchemy"
}

let person = Person()
print(person is Person) // true
print(person is Student) // false

let student = Student()
print(student is Person) // true
print(student is Student) // true
